content.raw:
Well I could solve the problem of initializing the objects [`gui`, `scene` ...] each `test` and ending with a lot of duplicates by moving all the tests in a single file,  we can portion them with `describes`, wont look so bad.

After some research, I believe karma doesn't run the garbage collector until the page is closed.

I believe we cant force sth like that since this will make us lose the `karma` report which is built incrementally.

What do you think?
content.html:
Well I could solve the problem of initializing the objects [gui, scene ...] each test and ending with a lot of duplicates by moving all the tests in a single file, we can portion them with describes, wont look so bad.

After some research, I believe karma doesn't run the garbage collector until the page is closed.

I believe we cant force sth like that since this will make us lose the karma report which is built incrementally.

What do you think?
